Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Not believing in force is the same as not believing in gravitation

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Curiosity is the lust of the mind

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Leisure is the Mother of Philosophy

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Such truth, as opposeth no man's profit, nor pleasure, is to all men welcome

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Force and fraud are in war the two cardinal virtues

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: A man cannot lay down the right of resisting them that assault him by force, to take away his life

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: In the state of nature profit is the measure of right

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: The great thing in the world is not so much to seek happiness as to earn peace and self-respect

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Try to learn something about everything and everything about something

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Learn what is true in order to do what is right

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Science has fulfilled her function when she has ascertained and enunciated truth

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: The great tragedy of science - the slaying of a beautiful hypothesis by an ugly fact

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is organized common sense where many a beautiful theory was killed by an ugly fact

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: There is the greatest practical benefit in making a few failures early in life

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: The results of political changes are hardly ever those which their friends hope or their foes fear

Quote.Author: Thomas Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Logical consequences are the scarecrows of fools and the beacons of wise men

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: The great accomplishments of man have resulted from the transmission of ideas and enthusiasm

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to succeed is to double your error rate

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Good design is good business

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever an individual or a business decides that success has been attained, progress stops

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: A manager is an assistant to his men

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Once an organization loses its spirit of pioneering and rests on its early work, its progress stops

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business and your business in your heart

Quote.Author: Thomas J. Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to supervise your men is from their reports that they make out

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: We go through our careers and things happen to us. Those experiences made me what I am

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: The law of diminishing returns is something I really believe in

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: Food should be fun

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: You're getting to know who the great chefs are through their books

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: It's one thing you aspire to: someday, you'll be able to write a book

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: We rely on our purveyors to tell us what's available and what's good

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: In any restaurant of this caliber, the chefs are in the same position, building relationships

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to write about what we were doing at the French Laundry, the recipes and the stories

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether it's destiny or fate or whatever, I don't think I could do a French Laundry anywhere else

Quote.Author: Thomas Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to drink young wines, wines which are robust and have a lot of forward fruit to them

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is forever

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: Literature is the stringing together of pictures in words

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole life was absorbed with my art. I was known by my schoolmates as the kid who could draw

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: Art transcends cultural boundaries

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to embrace people with love, unconditional love, like Christ did

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: High culture is paranoid about sentiment. But human beings are intensely sentimental

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: A piece of art is a compact form of the universe

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easy to have a lot of paintings or projects hanging around that are 'almost done.'

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: My brother and I always had jobs and worked from a young age

Quote.Author: Thomas Kinkade
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole Modernist lie is that art is about the artist

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: People's behavior makes sense if you think about it in terms of their goals, needs, and motives

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Every reasonable human being should be a moderate Socialist

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: I shall need to sleep three weeks on end to get rested from the rest I've had

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: War is only a cowardly escape from the problems of peace

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: A writer is somebody for whom writing is more difficult than it is for other people

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Animals do not admire each other. A horse does not admire its companion

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: The only religious way to think of death is as part and parcel of life

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Human reason needs only to will more strongly than fate, and she is fate

Quote.Author: Thomas Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are possessed by an idea, you find it expressed everywhere, you even smell it

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: The heart that has truly loved never forgets, But as truly loves on to the close

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Humility, that low, sweet root, from which all heavenly virtues shoot

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: What though youth gave love and roses, Age still leaves us friends and wine

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: A friendship that like love is warm; A love like friendship, steady

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: And the heart that is soonest awake to the flowers is always the first to be touch'd by the thorns

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: And soon, too soon, we part with pain, To sail o'er silent seas again

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: It is only to the happy that tears are a luxury

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: My only books were woman's looks, and folly's all they've taught me

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Fond memory brings the light of other days around me

Quote.Author: Thomas Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Ask a woman's advice, and whatever she advises, Do the very reverse and you're sure to be wise

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easier to run for office than to run the office

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: All politics is local

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: I know the kind of street I'm going down. I know my own strengths and weaknesses

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: That's politics. After six o'clock, we can be friends, but before six, it's politics

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us forget the frustrations of the past and think of our unfulfilled potential

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: Ninety-nine percent of the time, if you're straight with the press, they'll be straight with you

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: You better take advantage of the good cigars. You don't get much else in that job

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to be a strong Speaker. I hope to make some imaginative changes around here

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: You can teach an old dog new tricks, and this old dog wants to learn

Quote.Author: Thomas P. O'Neill
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly tried to make the House a more open and effective place, and I believe I succeeded

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not just trying to be good at one thing and then call it a day. I want to be like Bruno Mars

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm ever-changing and always evolving, always trying new things

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're a good person, that's all that really matters

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I dreamed of being nominated for a Grammy

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm obsessed with Bruno Mars' records. I'd give my right leg to be able to sing like that dude

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: I realized I'm a very, very white dancer

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: All my artist buddies make fun of me for being such a sensitive human being

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett

Quote.Author: Thomas Rhett
Quote.QuoteValue: Songs are like children in a way. They all need to find a home

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: Choose your friends with caution; plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: The future is as bright as your faith

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: Choose your love, Love your choice

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: We must not let our passions destroy our dreams

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: The reward of eternal life requires effort

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: Work will win when wishy washy wishing won t

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith and doubt cannot exist in the same mind at the same time, for one will dispel the other

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: We tend to become like those whom we admire

Quote.Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote.QuoteValue: I forbid you, agnostic, doubting thoughts, to destroy the house of my faith

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: Boredom is the feeling that everything is a waste of time; serenity, that nothing is

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: In the animal kingdom, the rule is, eat or be eaten; in the human kingdom, define or be defined

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as mental illness, hence also no such thing as psychotherapy

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: A teacher should have maximal authority, and minimal power

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: If you talk to God, you are praying; If God talks to you, you have schizophrenia

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: Clear thinking requires courage rather than intelligence

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: The system isn't stupid, but the people in it are

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz

Quote.Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no psychology; there is only biography and autobiography

Quote.Author: Tia Mowry

Quote.Author: Tia Mowry

Quote.Author: Tiger Shroff

Quote.Author: Tiger Shroff

Quote.QuoteValue: I've been a gamer all my life

Quote.Author: Tiger Woods

Quote.Author: Tiger Woods

Quote.Author: Tiger Woods
Quote.QuoteValue: Green and black go well together, don't they?

Quote.Author: Tiger Woods

Quote.Author: Tiger Woods

Quote.Author: Tila Tequila

Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I'm not hurting anybody, I don't think that anything I do is wrong
